messages.message: hey everyone! let's get this started. i'll take the 6-8-11 spot, looks like a solid base for some early roads.
pointing this road towards the coast, might grab that port later if the numbers treat me well.
hey alice, that's a nice start. i'm going to set up on the 6-5-3 and see if i can keep up with those roads!
pointing this road towards the center, gotta find some wheat soon or i'll be stuck eating sheep for dinner.
